settings.name: Nikita Choudhari
settings.title: Full Stack Developer
settings.summary: Full Stack Developer with experience in MERN stack and passionate about problem-solving and open-source contributions.

about.title: About Me
about.content: I am a passionate Full Stack Developer with a strong foundation in MERN stack and experience in developing innovative solutions. I have hands-on experience with IoT projects, creating GUI applications, and contributing to open-source projects. I am dedicated to continuous learning and problem-solving, always seeking opportunities to enhance my skills and contribute to meaningful projects. I am also certified in Python, Git/GitHub, Agile and Scrum and SQL.

items.description: Contributed to core company products like SmartUX, Workspace, and Runtime Manager within a collaborative team using the MERN stack. Created POCs related to proxy middleware & the integration of Angular apps into React applications & vice versa. Developed a flexible email service for the Workspace project, allowing easy configuration and seamless integration.

Hands-On experience with Raspberry Pi Pico W and Performed R&D on various sensors. Worked on Real World IoT Projects like Sensor Management System and used MQTT server for exchanging data between devices and server.
Created projects using core Java concepts. Used Java Swing and AWT to create stunning GUI applications.

items.title: PlantHealth
items.description: Developed an Android app for real-time Potato Leaf Disease Detection using image-based analysis. Integrated features like AI chatbot, prediction history, multilingual support, and disease detection via image capture or upload.

items.title: CampusPlaceHub
items.description: Designed a full-stack web portal for college Training and Placement Officers (TPO) to manage student placement data. Included secure login, CRUD operations, and dynamic dashboards for organization-wide accessibility.

items.title: Planetary Tourism System
items.description: Developed an innovative application enabling exploration and planning of space journeys to planets, moons, and asteroids. Users can earn virtual coins through inter-active games and quizzes to book tickets for celestial travel experiences.

items.title: Bank Management System
items.description: Developed a desktop GUI application for Admin-side Account Management, enabling efficient handling of customer data. Implemented features like withdrawal, deposit, balance check, customer search, and printable reports. Utilized JDBC for seamless integration between the front-end and database, ensuring secure real-time operations.

items.institution: JSPM's Imperial College Of Engineering and Research, Wagholi
